name: EZappt
overview:
EZappt, â€œEZ-appointmentâ€ is an enterprise appointment management and tracking software company. EZappt is a leader in web-based enterprise level software systems for online scheduling and appointment management. EZappt is a browser-based, integrated online registration, appointment and event software solution. Our solution enables online registration and tracks appointments and events for organization of all sizes. Virtually any appointment requiring interaction between two or more individuals (staff, clients, students, vendors, resources, event planning) is easier to make and to manage with the EZappt online scheduling solution. EZappt allows organizations to provide a new level of first class service, while lowering staff phone time and labor costs, improving management visibility, and expanding customer service to 24/7 availability.

With over 6 years of development, EZappt’s software system has the best workflow and feature set of any web-based product available. Everyday thousands of users trust EZappt’s system to manage appointments and events. Each year, over 98% of our active asp model clients renew their service, even though there’s often no obligation.

EZapptâ€™s robust .NET enterprise grade appointment and event software is 100% web-based, 99+% uptime guaranteed, meaning you can use it anytime, anywhere you access the Internet. EZappt supports Internet Explorer 6+, Fire Fox 2+, Opera, Safari, Google, and Google Chrome browsers. Our product has a graphically pleasing standard user interface that can be fully customized as needed.

EZappt specializes in online appointment scheduling and tracking which integrates with many legacy systems. EZapptâ€™s premiere EZams Campus Suite is student advising management solution for higher education that integrates with Oracle/PeopleSoft, Banner and other systems. EZappt operates in 3 major verticals; Higher Education, Government and Healthcare.
